plane



Planef

typedef float  Planef[4];
type: C typedef
description: plane float = vec3 normal + distance

Planed

typedef double Planed[4];
type: C typedef
description: plane double = vec3 normal + distance

m_plane_setd

void   m_plane_setd(vec3d normal, vec3d point, Planed res);
type: C function
description: initialize plane from normal (vec3) & point (vec3)

m_plane_from_pointsd

void   m_plane_from_pointsd(vec3d a, vec3d b, vec3d c, Planed res);
type: C function
description: initialize plane from 3 points (vec3)

m_plane_distance_to_pointd

double m_plane_distance_to_pointd(Planed plane, vec3d point);
type: C function
description: plane distance to point (vec3)

m_plane_distance_to_point4d

double m_plane_distance_to_point4d(Planed plane, vec4d point);
type: C function
description: plane distance to point (vec4)

m_plane_points_on_same_sided

bool   m_plane_points_on_same_sided(Planed plane, vec3d a, vec3d b);
type: C function
description: check if two points (vec3) are on the same side of a plane

m_plane_normalized

void   m_plane_normalized(Planed plane);
type: C function
description: normalize plane
